name: The Escape
paragraphs: You turn around and run as fast as you can, not stopping until you're outside the hospital. You lean against a nearby wall and take a few deep breaths, trying to compose yourself.

As you catch your breath, you notice something strange. There's a woman standing across the street, wearing a long coat and a fedora. She looks familiar, but you can't quite place her. Suddenly, it hits you. This woman is the same one who left the flyer for the psychic in the convenience store.
You start to cross the street to talk to her, but she disappears into an alleyway before you can reach her. You're left standing alone on the sidewalk, wondering what the hell is going on.
